title: Being like Bezos
description: Best practices learned while working with Amazon's CEO can be adopted at many firms, says former Amazon executive Bill Carr.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: Best practices learned while working with Amazon's CEO can be adopted at many firms, says former Amazon executive Bill Carr.
content:encoded: Best practices learned while working with Amazon's CEO can be adopted at many firms, says former Amazon executive Bill Carr.
